text: Kagra eri'za vaheka'a huzmantanke'za e'za, Ra Anumzamo'na nazeri havizahu kea hu'naze. Hagi kagra'agura amanage hunka hu'nane, nagra karisiramini'afi mani'ne'na, marerigatere'nea agonaramimofo morusapi vano nehu'na, Lebanoni zafa tanopafina vahe ovu'afi ufre'na knare'nare sida zafaramine, saipresi zafaraminena antagi'noe hunka hu'nane.
